meanings.definition: The condition or state of being an endoparasite.
meanings.sent1: Endoparasitisms can be harmful to the host organism.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study endoparasitisms to understand their impact on ecosystems.
meanings.sent3: The endoparasitisms of the tiny worm were like unwelcome guests in the body.
meanings.sent4: The endoparasitisms of corruption slowly drained the organization of its vitality.
meanings.sent5: The concept of endoparasitisms is both fascinating and unsettling.

meanings.definition: The practice of living as an endoparasite.
meanings.sent1: Endoparasitisms require a delicate balance to avoid harming the host.
meanings.sent2: The endoparasitisms of certain insects involve complex life cycles.
meanings.sent3: In the world of endoparasitisms, freeloaders thrive.
meanings.sent4: The endoparasitisms of laziness can slowly drain one's motivation.
meanings.sent5: The idea of endoparasitisms in society can be a thought-provoking topic.
